# Data Responsibility

  • Be Internet Awesome — Helping kids be safe, confident explorers of the online world.

  • Comic Strips SeguraNet — Comic strips targeted at a younger audience to convey Internet safety issues.

  • Better Internet for Kids — Core service platform to create a better internet for children and young people.

  • OnGuard Online — Government website that teaches users how to be safe, secure, and responsible online.

  • Personal Data and Privacy Working Group — Great list of links and resources related to data privacy.

  • Mozilla Learning Network — Lessons and platforms from Mozilla on everything from basic and advanced digital literacy, privacy, programming, and more — also has some incredible online and offline teaching activities.

  • Security in-a-Box — Blog and guide to digital security for activists and human rights fieldworkers, from the Tactical Technology Collective.

  • That One Privacy Site — Resource for digital privacy on the Internet.

  • Digital Impact — Data responsibility toolkit.

  • Boxcryptor — Encryption software to secure cloud files.

  • VeraCrypt — Free open source disk encryption software for Windows, MacOS and Linux.

  • Guardian Project — Non-profit group creating apps and promoting libraries and devices that protect data and communications.

  • Guardian Project Blog — Blog for the non-profit group creating apps and promoting libraries and devices that protect data and communications.

  • RightsCase — Digital security for civil society — open and reusable systems with a focus on privacy, online security, and information management.

  • Data Starter Kit for Humanitarian Field Staff — Concise tip sheets on privacy impact assessments, data minimization, encryption, archiving and more by Electronic Cash Transfer Learning Action Network.

  • Humanitarian Exchange Language (HXL) — A data standard, designed to improve information sharing during a humanitarian crisis without adding extra reporting burdens.

  • Healthsites.io — Canonical location for data and the tools necessary to upload, manage and make data around healthcare disease or disaster outbreak easily accessible.
